Html: How do you (or can you) transfer a program to the Wabbitemu TI-84 Plus from either my handheld TI-84 plus or from my TI Connect downloads? My students and I love this emulator because it really allows them to see more than just the screen display!

Hello,

Its pretty easy to transfer a program to Wabbit, to do so either drag and drop the program on top of the screen, or open it via the file menu. If you need to transfer a file on Wabbitemu to the computer, you can go View->Variables and then select the program you'd like to export and either drag it off the tree, or select the export button.

Thanks for your feedback. Let me know if you have any other questions, or features that would make it more helpful for you and your students.

BuckeyeDude
